post:
Ready2Frag  -  The host you can depend on.

 

Get a high-quality Chicago, IL VPS today!

 



 

Who We Are...

 

Ready2Frag is the relatively new but extremely quickly growing Gaming & VPS branch of HostVenom, LLC. We pride ourselves on a quality service at low costs to the end-user, without cutting any corners! Our premium company-owned hardware, downtown Chicago location, and dedicated staff exist only to serve you as our valued client and partner.

 

What We Do...

 

To put it in just a few words, we offer high-performance low-cost hosting solutions. Our Enteprrise-class hardware, including Supermicro chassis, Kingston and Super Talent DDR3 ECC RAM, Western Digital RE3/RE4 HDDs, Samsung 840 Evo and 840 Pro SSDs, LSI MegaRAID RAID Cards, and more allow us to offer awesome reliability at awesome prices. Our route-optimized and DDoS-Protected Chicago, IL network provide excellent routing, low latency, and fast transfer speeds.

 

We have chosen to locate this hardware in our own suite within the Steadfast Networks 725 S. Wells facility.

 

How We Do It...

 

We accomplish everything said above and more through our dedication to our clients. If you have an issue with your service, we'll not only resolve it, but we'll guarantee an account credit and will ask for your feedback every time you report an issue. Our VPS infrastructure is still relatively new, and undergoing constant improvement, so feedback is a necessary part of our business and its continued growth and improvement in the VPS market.

 



 

Chicago, IL E3 / SSD KVM VPSs

 

The Features:

  • SolusVM Control Panel
  • Pure RAID-10 SSD Storage
  • Intel Xeon E3 Processors
  • Automated Setup
  • DDoS Protection - Up to 4Gbps / 4MPPS
  • 1Gbps Network Ports
 

The Hardware:

  • Intel Xeon E3-1230v2
  • 32GB DDR3 ECC RAM
  • 4x 250GB Samsung 840 Evo SSDs (RAID-10)
  • LSI MegaRAID 9271-4i RAID Card
  • 1Gbps Network Port

The Network:

  • Inbound through GigeNET
  • Outbound through Steadfast
  • InterNAP FCP Optimized
